directions: Place salami in a grill pan or skillet over medium-high heat. Drizzle with olive oil; season with salt and pepper. Cook until grill marks appear, 5 to 7 minutes. Flip; cook until second side is browned, 5 to 7 minutes.
Place salami in a small bowl; mix in Parmesan cheese and oregano. Garnish with parsley.
ingredients: 1 pound salami, cut into bite-size pieces
1/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
title: Savory Oregano Salami
